gen:link.msg:message: `Consideration` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `PositionOfNonSeniorOfficialsAxis`, omdat `PositionOfNonSeniorOfficialsAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfNonSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU4_Set00PositionOfNonSeniorOfficialsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfNonSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU4_Set00PositionOfNonSeniorOfficialsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IndividualMaximumRemuneration` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `PositionOfNonSeniorOfficialsAxis`, omdat `PositionOfNonSeniorOfficialsAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfNonSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU1_Set00PositionOfNonSeniorOfficialsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfNonSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU1_Set00PositionOfNonSeniorOfficialsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Remuneration` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `PositionOfNonSeniorOfficialsAxis`, omdat `PositionOfNonSeniorOfficialsAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfNonSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU3_Set00PositionOfNonSeniorOfficialsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfNonSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU3_Set00PositionOfNonSeniorOfficialsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `PositionOfNonSeniorOfficialsAxis`, omdat `PositionOfNonSeniorOfficialsAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfNonSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU2_Set00PositionOfNonSeniorOfficialsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfNonSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU2_Set00PositionOfNonSeniorOfficialsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE` MOET groter of gelijk zijn dan 0.025. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfNonSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1NumericGEConstant1_ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfNonSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1NumericGEConstant1_ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE` MOET kleiner of gelijk zijn dan 1.000. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfNonSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1NumericLEConstant1_ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfNonSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1NumericLEConstant1_ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
